name: Chimichurri Sauce
description: Usually paired with meat, chimichurri sauce plays off of grilled bass just as beautifully, as long as you use a light vinegar like champagne or rice wine, rather than balsamic. This comes together fast and adds a warmth to the cooler flavors of summer.
recipeIngredient: 1 small garlic clove or 1 small shallot
1 tablespoon champagne or rice wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the parsley, oregano and garlic or shallot. Place in a medium bowl.
Stir in the vinegar, lime juice, olive oil and chili flakes. Add salt to taste.
